DODGE DRIVE

  • Genre: Spherical world and high score based game.

  • Tech Stack: Unity, Blender, Audacity.

  • Programming Language: C#.

  • Project Status: Shipped.

  • Game Description: Goal of the player is to survive the meteor strike (inspired from Brackey's Shrinking Planet).

  • Platform: PC.

  • Platform(s) Available: GameJolt.

  • Click here to download the game!

LASER DEFENDER

  • Laser Defender is a 2D space shooter game prototype.

  • It is made with basic concepts of game development (Unity 3D) like instantiating and animating 2D sprites.

  • I made this game by following the Udemy's Unity 3D course and I improved this prototype further by adding few things like procedural level generation, increasing difficulty as the player progresses, high score system.

  • You can get the course here! I really recommend this course for all beginners.

  • Click here! to get this project from GitHub.

×

GLITCH GARDEN

  • Glitch Garden is a 2D strategy game (clone of plants vs zombies) and is also from Unity 3D course.

  • I improved this prototype by implementing Raycasting, difficulty, procedural level generation and I made this game prototype complete android portable.

  • Click here! to get this project from GitHub.

×

GOLD GUARDIAN

  • Gold Guardian is a 2D pixel art strategy survival game.

  • I created all the assets for this game on my own using Matmoset Hexels (tried pixel art for the first time).

  • It is a single level survival game. Spawning of gold piles in the game is completely procedural for every new game.

  • Spawning of enemies (goblins) is completely dependent on the position of gold piles and they first target the nearest unoccupied gold pile.

  • Game is still under development!
